mapper.select: SELECT FB.*, COUNT(R.board_idx) AS count, MAX(closed_chk) AS closed_chk FROM freeboard FB LEFT JOIN report R ON FB.board_idx = R.board_idx GROUP BY FB.board_idx, FB.board_category, FB.mem_id, FB.board_title, FB.board_contents, FB.board_file, FB.board_visitcount, FB.board_postdate, FB.closed_chk order by FB.board_postdate desc
